questions: Step 1: Create a project folder and set up HTML, CSS, JavaScript files, along with an Images folder and a separate responsive CSS file if required.
Step 2: Use various HTML tags (section, header, nav, meta, title, head, div, input, img, etc.) to structure the webpage.
Step 3: Style the HTML elements responsively to make the page visually appealing across devices using CSS.
Step 4: Use media queries for responsive styles and to adjust container widths as needed.
Step 5: Implement JavaScript to toggle the hamburger menu on smaller screens, enabling smooth navigation.
